rooms.description: Spacious entrance hall with traditional Kerala motifs and wooden carvings.
Open-plan living area integrated with the kitchen space featuring a tiled floor and large windows for natural light.
Open-plan kitchen designed with modern amenities while retaining traditional elements such as granite countertops.
Master bedroom located in the north-east corner for Vastu compliance, featuring a private balcony and ample storage.
Child's bedroom placed adjacent to the master bedroom ensuring proximity for family security.
Modern bathroom with contemporary fixtures and water-saving amenities.
Small utility room for laundry and storage, positioned near the kitchen.

openings.location: north wall of living area for optimal sunlight
between master bedroom and child's bedroom
